Row.Text: Gain a Technology upon capturing a Settlement for the first time. Codices are not awarded from Technologies. Can generate Codices from Conquest after completing the Tupšarrūtu Civic.

[BLIST][LI]Gain a [B]Technology [/B]upon capturing a Settlement for the first time. [LI][B]Codices [/B]are not awarded from Technologies.[LI]Can generate [B]Codices[/B] from Conquest after completing the Tupšarrūtu Civic.[LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Dur-Sharrukin[/B].[/LIST]
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Assyria's associated Wonder.
